fields.label: Ansible Tower Hostname
fields.help_text: The Ansible Tower base URL to authenticate with.

fields.label: Username
fields.help_text: The Ansible Tower user to authenticate as.This should not be set if an OAuth token is being used.

fields.label: OAuth Token
fields.help_text: An OAuth token to use to authenticate to Tower with.This should not be set if username/password are being used.
